mapper.select:
insert into exam_info (title, start_time, end_time, allow_ip, allow_judger_ids, create_time, modify_time, modify_user_id, description) values
(#{item.title}, #{item.startTime}, #{item.endTime}, #{item.allowIp}, #{item.allowJudgerIds}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.modifyTime}, #{item.modifyUserId}, #{item.description})
